toggle.title: Start / Stop
toggle.text: This button will start or stop SynthQuencer

tuning.title: Tuning
tuning.text: Change the frequency of the note A4

kill-sound.title: Kill Sound
kill-sound.text: Stop all the sounds that are currently playing

envelope.title: Envelope
envelope.text: Change the envelope (gain over time) of the synth!

attack.title: Attack
attack.text: Change the 'fade in' of the synth!

decay.title: Decay
decay.text: Change the time it takes the gain to go to the level of sustain

sustain.title: Sustain
sustain.text: The value the decay goes to

release.title: Release
release.text: 'Fade out' after it has reached sustain
